edu.stanford.pigir.pigudf

Class TupleFieldMultiStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.StoreFunc
      • edu.stanford.pigir.pigudf.TupleFieldMultiStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.pig.StoreFuncInterface

    public class TupleFieldMultiStorage
extends org.apache.pig.StoreFunc
    The UDF stores a field of a tuple into its own file. A field of the tuple is also used to name the file. Sample usage: A = LOAD 'mydata' USING PigStorage() as (a, b, c); STORE A INTO '/my/home/output' USING MultiStorage('/my/home/output','0', '1'); Parameter details: /my/home/output (Required) : The DFS path where output directories and files will be created. 0 (Required) : Index of field whose values should be used to name the files '1' (Required) : Index of field whose values are stored into the file.
